Title: Permits the use of ATVs on certain roadways in the county of Wayne
Summary: Permits the use of ATVs on state route one hundred four between the western county line of Wayne county and the northern town line of the town of Hannibal in the county of Oswego.
LawCode: Amd ยง2405, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting ATV use on certain roadways in the county of Wayne
